installCommand: set -e; echo Using Node $(node -v); echo Using npm $(npm -v); if [ -f frontend/package.json ]; then cd frontend; fi; npm install --no-audit --no-fund || (npm i -g npm@9 && echo Retrying with npm $(npm -v) && npm install --no-audit --no-fund)
buildCommand: if [ -f frontend/package.json ]; then (cd frontend && npm run build); else npm run build; fi
